New Records: Dawid Malan scored a maiden World Cup hundred
Reece Topley made his World Cup debut
Key Match Events: Reece Topley took 4 wickets for 43 runs
Post-Match Reflections: England responded emphatically to their defeat in their opening World Cup match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh were fined 5% of their match fee for being one over behind the required over rate
Others: The margin of victory was a comfort to England, whose standing and confidence had taken a dent following their thumping in Ahmedabad
